com.safenetinc.luna.provider.signature

Class LunaSignature

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.security.SignatureSpi
      • com.safenetinc.luna.provider.signature.LunaSignature
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    LunaSignatureDSA, LunaSignatureMLDSA, LunaSignatureRSA

    public abstract class LunaSignature
extends java.security.SignatureSpi
    A base class for all Luna provider signature engine classes.

    Any key used to initialize a LunaSignature that was not created on the HSM will be imported into the current default HSM slot.

    • Constructor Detail

      • LunaSignature

        public LunaSignature(long mechType)
        Creates a new LunaSignature with the specified PKCS mechanism type. This is for use by the JCE internals only; normal access to objects of this class is through Signature.getInstance()
        Parameters:
        mechType - mechanism for signature

    • Method Detail

      • engineInitSign

        protected void engineInitSign(java.security.PrivateKey privateKey,
                  java.security.SecureRandom random)
                       throws java.security.InvalidKeyException
        Initializes this signature object with the specified private key for signing operations. The Luna provider supplies its own source of randomness, so the random parameter is ignored.
        Overrides:
        engineInitSign in class java.security.SignatureSpi
        Parameters:
        privateKey - the private key of the identity whose signature will be generated.
        random - unused
        Throws:
        java.security.InvalidKeyException - if the key is improperly encoded, parameters are missing, and so on.
